scripts.test: npm run build:js:test && mocha dist/public/test.js --ignoreLeaks false --reporter html --globals Audio
scripts.watch:js: watchify app/app.js -o dist/public/app.js -dv  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build:js:test: browserify app/**/*.spec.js -o dist/public/test.js -dv  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch:js:test: watchify app/**/*.spec.js -o dist/public/test.js -dv  -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
